scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w @dexa/api && npm run build -w @dexa/cli && npm run build -w @dexa/web --if-present && npm run build -w @dexa/site --if-present && npm run build -w @dexa/docs --if-present && npm run build -w @dexa/desktop --if-present && npm run build -w @dexa/mobile --if-present
